title: PATH LiDAR: Full-Waveform LiDAR Simulator for Vegetation Canopy Analysis
description: A Python-based full-waveform LiDAR simulator for vegetation canopy analysis using the PATH_LiDAR model. This simulator generates realistic LiDAR waveforms for nadir-looking instruments over forest canopies with support for multiple crown shapes (cylinder, sphere, cone) and includes RAMI validation data.
